jobs.title: Owner Operator Lease Program
jobs.description:
Running Area:

Central and Eastern US routes with consistent freight and excellent earning potential. This premium lease purchase opportunity offers a path to truck ownership with no money down.

Pay & Mileage:

  • Gross Weekly Average: $1,250-$1,550/week
  • Mileage pay between $1.00-$2.00 per mile on loaded and dispatched empty miles
  • Tiered mileage pay: 0-200 miles: $2.00, 201-400 miles: $1.15, 401+ miles: $1.00
  • Fuel surcharge paid on all loaded miles
  • 70% of accessorial pay (stops, detention, layover)
  • 100% of unloading fees with receipt

Lease Program Highlights:

  • 2015 Freightliner Cascadia with Detroit engines
  • No money down, no credit check, no balloon payment
  • Walkaway lease program with low weekly payments ($490-$590)
  • All-inclusive tractor package ($750-$850) covers tractor payment, insurance, IFTA, plates, and satellite communications
  • Powertrain warranty up to 500,000 miles
  • Fuel saver automatic transmissions
  • Double bunks, full fairing kits, and dual drive tires
  • Significant fuel and maintenance discounts through vendor network
requirements: Minimum 1 year of verifiable OTR experience
Must NOT reside in California, Illinois, New York, or New Jersey
Must pass DOT physical and drug screen
Must be able to attend Monday orientation
benefits: Path to truck ownership with no money down
Security deposit returned after lease completion
